you.
And they carry that.

We...
We champion the underdog.

We champion the underdog to the point where
it's not an underdog anymore and it annoys
us.

I, from somewhere, had this strange, unjustified
belief that it will be all right.

Maybe I was born American, and I always thought

I just thought it'll be fine.
